The Cubic Prepare Page automatically analyzes your customizations and prepares advanced options for the next steps in the customization process:

* Identify disk boot kernels
* Identify installed packages
* Create the package manifest for a typical install †
* Create the package manifest for a minimal install ††
* Save the package manifest

<img src="https://github.com/PJ-Singh-001/Cubic/blob/release/screenshots/Cubic%20Prepare%20Page.png" width="600"/>

This page will automatically transition to the next page when it is done.

† An alert icon (?) next to this step means that Ubiquity is not installed.

†† An alert icon (?) next to this step means that Ubiquity is not installed, or the version of Ubiquity is less than 18.04, which does not support Minimal installs.
